guild_settings.title: .fmbot server configuration - {guildName}
guild_settings.users_blocked_from_wk: **{count}** users blocked from WhoKnows and server charts.
guild_settings.activity_threshold_set: Users must have used .fmbot in the last **{days}** days to be visible.
guild_settings.no_activity_threshold: There is no activity requirement set for being visible.
guild_settings.crowns_disabled: Crown functionality has been disabled on this server.
guild_settings.crowns_description: Users earn crowns whenever they're the #1 user for an artist.
guild_settings.users_blocked_from_crowns: **{count}** users are blocked from earning crowns.
guild_settings.crown_min_playcount: The minimum playcount for a crown is set to **{count}** or higher
guild_settings.crown_activity_set: Users must have used .fmbot in the last **{days}** days to earn crowns.
guild_settings.no_crown_activity: There is no activity requirement set for earning crowns.
guild_settings.no_reactions: No automatic reactions enabled for `fm` and `featured`.
guild_settings.select_setting: Select setting you want to change

language_setting.title: Set server language
language_setting.description: Select the language for .fmbot responses in this server.
language_setting.note: Note: Command names will always remain in English.

out_of_sync.title: Using Spotify and tracking is out of sync?
out_of_sync.description_intro: .fmbot uses your Last.fm account for knowing what you listen to.
out_of_sync.description_lag: Last.fm and Spotify sometimes have issues keeping up with your current song, which can cause `{prefix}fm` and other commands to lag behind the song you're currently listening to.
out_of_sync.not_affiliated: **.fmbot is not affiliated with Last.fm**. Your music is tracked by Last.fm, and not by .fmbot.
out_of_sync.not_fmbot_issue: This means that this is a Last.fm issue and **not an .fmbot issue**. __We can't fix it for you__, but we can give you tips that worked for others.
out_of_sync.full_guide_link: If the two options above don't work, check out **[the complete guide for this issue on the Last.fm support forums](https://support.last.fm/t/spotify-has-stopped-scrobbling-what-can-i-do/3184)**.
out_of_sync.lastfm_issues: ‚ö†Ô∏è [Last.fm](https://twitter.com/lastfmstatus) is currently experiencing issues, so the steps listed above might not work. .fmbot is not affiliated with Last.fm.

supporter.perk_stats_desc: -# Unlock lifetime Last.fm data for deeper analysis. Track first listens, get expanded profiles, expanded commands, your full Discogs collection and more.
supporter.perk_import_desc: -# Import and access your full Spotify and Apple Music history together with your Last.fm data for the most accurate playcounts, listening time, and insights.
supporter.perk_time_desc: -# See exactly when you discovered and re-discovered artists, albums, and tracks in commands and through the exclusive Discoveries and Gaps commands.
supporter.perk_games_desc: -# Remove the daily limit on Jumble and Pixel Jumble and play as much as you want.
supporter.perk_customize_desc: -# Expand your .fm footer, add more friends, set automatic emoji reactions, and personalize your experience.
supporter.perk_lyrics_desc: -# View your favorite `.lyrics` directly inside of .fmbot.
supporter.perk_exclusive_desc: -# Show your support with a badge, gain access to a private [Discord role and channel](https://discord.gg/fmbot), and a higher chance to be featured on Supporter Sunday (next up in {days} {daysString}).
supporter.short_description: ‚≠ê Take your .fmbot experience to the next level with new features and benefits. Import and use your history, access extra statistics, play unlimited games, support development and much more. Please note that .fmbot is not affiliated with Last.fm.
supporter.thank_you_title: Thank you for being a supporter
supporter.manage_below: Manage your subscription with the button below.
supporter.gifted_status: You have been gifted supporter status! Since this was a gift, you cannot manage this subscription directly.
supporter.manage_link_below: Manage your subscription with the link below.

gift_supporter.error_no_account: ‚ùå This user has not used .fmbot before. They need to set up their account first.
gift_supporter.error_self_gift: ‚ùå You cannot gift supporter to yourself. Use `/getsupporter` instead.
gift_supporter.error_already_supporter: ‚ùå The user you want to gift supporter already has access to the supporter perks.
gift_supporter.title: üéÅ Gift .fmbot supporter
gift_supporter.note_content:
- This is a gift purchase - no subscription will be created
- The recipient will receive all supporter benefits
- Your identity will not be revealed

supporters_list.description: Thank you to all our supporters that help keep .fmbot running. To view all supporter perks and join this list, run `{prefix}getsupporter`.
supporters_list.title: .fmbot supporters overview

help.title: .fmbot help & command overview
help.import_manage: **`/import manage`** | *Manage and configure your existing imports*
help.main_command_desc: *Displays last scrobbles, and looks different depending on the mode you've set.*
help.connecting_desc: To use .fmbot, you have to connect a Last.fm account. Last.fm is a website that tracks what music you listen to. Get started with `{prefix}login`.
help.logged_in: Logged in to .fmbot with the Last.fm account '{username}'
help.commands_dropdown: - Or use the dropdown below this message to pick a category
help.lastfm_issues:
‚ö†Ô∏è [Last.fm](https://twitter.com/lastfmstatus) is currently experiencing issues.
.fmbot is not affiliated with Last.fm.
